polymarket/Services/GammaApiClient.cs.description: GetMarketsAsync method implemented with pagination (offset/limit). Uses query string builder pattern with conditional parameters. Search pattern is converted to slug format (lowercase, spaces to dashes) for slug_starts_with API parameter.

polymarket/Services/ClobApiClient.cs.description: GetPriceHistoryAsync method implemented. Uses /prices-history?market={tokenId}&interval=max&fidelity=60 endpoint. Returns List<PricePoint> for historical prices. Handles HTTP 404 by returning empty list (invalid tokens). Ready for retry logic implementation in subtask-4-3.
